front.title: Supplement to IEEE Standard Rating Structure for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This supplement replaces the last paragraph of 5.11.4.2 in C37.04- 1979 and adds a new section, 5.11.4.3, Initial Transient Recovery Voltage.
